Name: Dither Statistics
Author: Thierry Tschanz
Description: Comprehensive dithering analysis plugin with real-time statistics, visual charts, and experimental quality assessment. Features include pixel drift tracking, settle time monitoring, and advanced pattern evaluation using Centered L₂ Discrepancy, Voronoi tessellation, and drizzle coverage metrics. Direct PHD2 integration for accurate pixel shift detection.
Changelog:
v1.1.0.0: Added experimental Quality Assessment with Centered L₂ Discrepancy, Voronoi Cell CV, Drizzle Gap-Fill Metrics (1×/2×/3×), combined quality scoring, pattern recommendations, and detailed quality report export. Improved chart tooltips and UI formatting.

v1.0.1.0: Added direct PHD2 integration for accurate dither detection and pixel shift tracking.

v1.0.0.0: Initial release with real-time dither statistics, settle time tracking, and visual charts.
